{{title|1=operator==,&lt;,&gt;,&lt;=,&gt;=,&lt;=&gt;{{small|(ranges::stride_view::''iterator'')}}}}
{{cpp/ranges/stride_view/navbar}}

{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=c++23|1=
friend constexpr bool operator==( const /*iterator*/&amp; x, std::default_sentinel_t );
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++23|1=
friend constexpr bool operator==( const /*iterator*/&amp; x, const /*iterator*/&amp; y )
    requires std::equality_comparable&lt;ranges::iterator_t&lt;Base&gt;&gt;;
}}
{{dcl|num=3|since=c++23|1=
friend constexpr bool operator&lt;( const /*iterator*/&amp; x, const /*iterator*/&amp; y )
    requires ranges::random_access_range&lt;Base&gt;;
}}
{{dcl|num=4|since=c++23|1=
friend constexpr bool operator&gt;( const /*iterator*/&amp; x, const /*iterator*/&amp; y )
    requires ranges::random_access_range&lt;Base&gt;;
}}
{{dcl|num=5|since=c++23|1=
friend constexpr bool operator&lt;=( const /*iterator*/&amp; x, const /*iterator*/&amp; y )
    requires ranges::random_access_range&lt;Base&gt;;
}}
{{dcl|num=6|since=c++23|1=
friend constexpr bool operator&gt;=( const /*iterator*/&amp; x, const /*iterator*/&amp; y )
    requires ranges::random_access_range&lt;Base&gt;;
}}
{{dcl|num=7|since=c++23|1=
friend constexpr auto operator&lt;=&gt;( const /*iterator*/&amp; x, const /*iterator*/&amp; y )
    requires ranges::random_access_range&lt;Base&gt; and
             std::three_way_comparable&lt;ranges::iterator_t&lt;Base&gt;&gt;;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Compares the underlying iterators/sentinels.

Let {{rlpi|/#Data members|current_}} be the underlying iterator, and {{rlpi|/#Data members|end_}} be the underlying sentinel.

@1@ Equivalent to {{c|1=return x.current_ == x.end_;}}.
@2@ Equivalent to {{c|1=return x.current_ == y.current_;}}.
@3@ Equivalent to {{c|1=return x.current_ &lt; y.current_;}}.
@4@ Equivalent to {{c|1=return y &lt; x;}}
@5@ Equivalent to {{c|1=return !(y &lt; x);}}
@6@ Equivalent to {{c|1=return !(x &lt; y);}}
@7@ Equivalent to {{c|1=return x.current_ &lt;=&gt; y.current_;}}.

{{cpp/hidden friend|{{tt|std::ranges::stride_view::''iterator''&lt;Const&gt;}}|plural=yes}}

{{cpp/note synthesized eq}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|x, y|iterators to compare}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
result of comparison
